help_administration_backup.lang_hab1: Note: After you have made your changes, click Save Settings to apply your changes.
help_administration_backup.lang_hab4: To backup the Router's configuration settings, click this option and follow the on-screen instructions.
help_administration_backup.lang_hab6: To restore the Router's configuration settings, click this option and follow the on-screen instructions. (You must have previously backed up the Router's configuration settings.)
help_administration_backup.lang_hab7: Note: For more information, refer to the online User Guide at www.linksys.com.
